metadata.dc:author: González de Rivera, J L
Benítez, M H
Gracia Marco, R
de las Cuevas Castresana, C
metadata.dc:description: There is no precise documentation about an universal nuclear composition of the depressive syndrome. Moreover, secondary manifestations of depression are even more controversial. In this paper the symptomatic profile of a sample of depressive patients attended in the Hospital Universitario de Canarias is analyzed. The characteristics, profiles and frequencies of the symptomatic pattern are discussed and commented.
metadata.dc:title: Perfil sintomático de la depresión.
[Symptomatic profile of depression].
